actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide an alternate distribution of education jobs funds for Texas.
short_title: Fairness for Texas Schools Act of 2010

summary.text: Fairness for Texas Schools Act of 2010 - Allows the Secretary of Education to allocate funds from the Education Jobs Fund to entities in Texas other than the state government if the Secretary cannot provide such funds to the state government because of its failure to provide certain assurances regarding the distribution of such funds and the level of state support for elementary and secondary education.

titles.title: Fairness for Texas Schools Act of 2010
A bill to provide an alternate distribution of education jobs funds for Texas.
